results.name: Continued fraction for i^i = exp(-Pi/2).
link: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..20000
H. S. Uhler, On the numerical value of i^i, Amer. Math. Monthly, 28 (1921), 114-116.
Index entries for continued fractions for constants
program: (PARI) { allocatemem(932245000); default(realprecision, 21000); x=contfrac(exp(-Pi/2)); for (n=1, 20000, write("b049007.txt", n, " ", x[n])); } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Apr 28 2009
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
